pv3199.math.structures

Class ComplexMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • pv3199.math.structures.Matrix<T>
      • pv3199.math.structures.NumberMatrix<ComplexNumber>
        • pv3199.math.structures.ComplexMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ComplexMatrix
extends NumberMatrix<ComplexNumber>
    Holds complex numbers in the form of a mathematical matrix.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • ComplexMatrix

        public ComplexMatrix(int width,
                     int height)
              throws IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a new ComplexMatrix with given width and height dimensions.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the matrix.
        height - the height of the matrix.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the dimensions are negative.

      • ComplexMatrix

        public ComplexMatrix(ComplexNumber[][] initialData)
              throws NullPointerException,
                     IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a ComplexMatrix from a 2D array of complex numbers.
        Parameters:
        initialData - the initial data that this matrix will hold.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any of the elements in the initial data array are null
        IllegalArgumentException - if the initial data array is not rectangular

        Converts a 2D array of real numbers to complex numbers.
        Parameters:
        realData - the 2D array of real numbers to convert.
        Returns:
        a 2D array of complex numbers equivalent to the original 2D array.

      • divide

        public ComplexMatrix divide(NumberMatrix<ComplexNumber> matrix)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException,
                            IllegalMatrixException
        Description copied from class: NumberMatrix
        "Divides" this matrix from another matrix, or simply multiplies this matrix with the inverse of the other matrix.
        Specified by:
        divide in class NumberMatrix<ComplexNumber>
        Parameters:
        matrix - the other matrix.
        Returns:
        the quotient of this matrix against the other matrix.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the other matrix is not a square (for it's inverse) or if the width of this matrix is not same as the height of the other matrix's inverse.
        IllegalMatrixException

      • pow

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this matrix raised to an integer exponent.
        Throws:
        IllegalMatrixException - if this matrix is not a square
